statements: SELECT * FROM NanoparticleSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, diameter FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE sample_type='Gold';
SELECT sample_name, material_composition, surface_area FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE diameter < 50;
SELECT sample_id, sample_type FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE surface_area > 100;
SELECT * FROM NanoparticleSamples ORDER BY diameter DESC;
SELECT sample_name, diameter FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE sample_type = 'gold' ORDER BY diameter DESC
SELECT sample_name, material_composition, diameter FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE material_composition LIKE '%oxide%'
SELECT * FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE surface_area > 50 AND diameter < 30
SELECT sample_name, material_composition FROM NanoparticleSamples WHERE sample_type = 'silver' OR sample_type = 'platinum' ORDER BY sample_name ASC
SELECT sample_type, COUNT(sample_id) AS number_of_samples FROM NanoparticleSamples GROUP BY sample_type HAVING COUNT(sample_id) > 1 ORDER BY number_of_samples DESC
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_name, particle_size FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE particle_size > 100;
SELECT sample_name, material_composition FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE classification_type = 'Metal';
SELECT * FROM sample_properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%size%';
SELECT sample_name, material_composition, particle_size FROM nanoparticle_samples ORDER BY particle_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_name, material_composition FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_id, particle_size FROM nanoparticle_samples ORDER BY particle_size DESC;
SELECT sample_name, property_name, property_value FROM nanoparticle_samples JOIN sample_properties ON nanoparticle_samples.sample_id = sample_properties.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE particle_size > 100 AND classification_type = 'Category-A';
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_size FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE sample_size > 10;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, classification FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE classification = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM sample_properties INNER JOIN nanoparticle_samples ON sample_properties.sample_id = nanoparticle_samples.sample_id;
SELECT characteristic_name, characteristic_value FROM sample_characteristics WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM nanoparticle_samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_size, classification FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE classification = 'A';
SELECT s.sample_name, sp.property_name, sp.property_value FROM nanoparticle_samples s JOIN sample_properties sp ON s.sample_id = sp.sample_id;
SELECT sc.characteristic_name, sc.characteristic_value, ns.sample_name FROM sample_characteristics sc JOIN nanoparticle_samples ns ON sc.sample_id = ns.sample_id ORDER BY sc.characteristic_name ASC;
SELECT id, name, size FROM nanoparticle_properties;
SELECT id, shape, surface_area FROM nanoparticle_properties WHERE size > 50;
SELECT label FROM classification_labels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, composition FROM sample_characteristics WHERE density > 1.2;
SELECT sample_id_1, sample_id_2, similarity_score FROM comparison_results WHERE classification_result = 'Positive';
SELECT id, name, shape FROM nanoparticle_properties ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM classification_labels WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, size, shape FROM nanoparticle_properties WHERE size > 100 ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT sample_id, composition, purity FROM sample_characteristics WHERE purity >= 0.95;
SELECT sample_id_1, sample_id_2, similarity_score, classification_result FROM comparison_results WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_name, particle_size FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE particle_shape='Sphere';
SELECT DISTINCT material_composition FROM nanoparticle_samples ORDER BY material_composition DESC;
SELECT sample_id, particle_shape FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE particle_size > 100 ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sample_properties WHERE density BETWEEN 1.0 AND 1.5;
SELECT * FROM nanoparticle_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, particle_size, material_composition FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE particle_shape = 'Spherical';
SELECT sample_name, particle_shape FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE particle_size > 50 ORDER BY particle_size DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, density, color FROM nanoparticle_samples JOIN sample_properties ON nanoparticle_samples.sample_id = sample_properties.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM sample_classification WHERE classification_confidence > 0.8 AND classification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY classification_confidence DESC;
